text: Xiazi [bu chuzheng] shi bu shou zebei de, quezi [bu chuzheng] shi bu shou zebei de, bingren [bu chuzheng] shi bu shou zebei de. Shei fucong an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng], ta [an la] jiang shi shei jinru zhu heliuguo de leyuan. Shei taobi [bu chuzheng], ta [an la] jiang yi tongku de xingfa chengzhi shei.
